title: Talking Dems - Michael Bennet Fields Questions from The Daily Show Audience
itunes:title: Talking Dems - Michael Bennet Fields Questions from The Daily Show Audience
description:
2020 Democratic presidential hopeful Michael Bennet discusses his plans to improve public education and ensure access to affordable housing in the wake of gentrification.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
